body:
Here is the image that didn't display when I didn't enter the Alt Text & Title fields (name of file below)

Note that when I type after adding an image, sometimes a blue line goes across the top of the screen & the broken icon displays (maybe that was the issue?)

![](/cms/cms-assets/releaseNotes/map-releasedate-2024-04-28-shortdescription-for-noah-body-here-is-the-image-that-didnt-display-when-i-didnt-enter-the-alt-text-title-fields-name-of-file-below-n-nnote-that-when-i-type-after-adding-an-image-sometimes-a-blue-line-goes/robinbirdpic2-1-.png)

Hope you can figure out why it didn't display (robinbirdpic2-1-.png)
